text:
@realDonaldTrump You are truly a mentally deranged psychopath. Every tweet you make is a lie targeted to your MAGA MORONS.

The US is in a major recession & you are TOTALLY to blame. You have KILLED 112,000 Americans by your incompetent handling of the COVID-19 pandemic. https://t.co/vVNJqNeQ1F

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
